file_content.text: Master Sav? Master Sav? You've killed him.
You are next if you dare face me.
Shall you join him?
Hold there. I do not mean to fight. I came to honor you for doing what could not be done.
You can't say he wasn't asking for it.
He had it coming.
Yes, I heard him rant, as he so often does.
Want to introduce yourself?
I am Seeker Kabath. I serve Master Sav... or did. You have done what no one could do.
Master Sav believed nothing could kill him. We walked in his footsteps, testing the limits of the body.
But it's clear from your ordeal in the Crypt that you surpassed him.
Do I have to take on the rest of you crazies?
Are we going to fight?
No. Your potential is rare and inspiring. I would no sooner destroy you than tear apart a priceless painting.
I'm still too cold to care. That was miserable!
And it wasn't fun.
I can change that, if you allow me.
Uh-huh. What's that mean?
With the proper technique, you might resist the elements as we do. I would be honored for you to learn from me.
If you feel you can teach me.
I live to learn.
Sit with me, then. Close your eyes and breathe.
Each of us has a fire burning within our body. If tended to, it can blaze hot enough to protect us.
Good. I see the signs in you. With practice, the cold will hold no danger to you.
Now I will gather the rest of the Brotherhood and leave this planet.
I'm not in a cult, I'm not joining and I'm not listening.
No. Leave or die.
Then I will gather those around me and leave Hoth. What the best of us could not survive would surely kill the least of us.
If you see a Hailstorm Brother from this moment on, they are not loyal to me. Deal with them as you see fit.
